name: relicense
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to give or receive official permission to do or have something again, especially after the original permission has come to an end: The government has relicensed the project for another twenty years. I have to re-license my car next month. Related word
license
More examplesFewer examplesThere needs to be a thorough inspection before we can relicense the factory.The bishop can refuse to re-license a priest who has brought the Church into disrepute.The agency would not relicense the power station until it met its new environmental standards.
